title: Intego Yacu
missionStatement: Gutuma uburezi bw'ubwiza buri mwana bugeraho, ahantu hose, binyuze ku bubasha busangiwe bwo kubika ku ntego.
missionBelief: Twizera ko abantu nibabika ku ntego kandi bagatanga mu bugaragarire, dushobora kurema impinduka irambye mu miryango ku isi hose.
visionSubtitle: Isi Aho Buri Mwana Afite Ibikoresho byo Kwiga
visionP1: Turebye ejo hazaza aho nta mwana uburizwamo uburezi kubera kubura ibikoresho. Aho ibikoresho by'ishuri, ibitabo, n'ibikoresho by'uburezi byagerwa na buri mwanyeshuri, hatitawe ku miterere y'ubukungu bwabo.
visionP2: Binyuze muri AidVault, turimo kubaka umuryango w'isi wose w'ababika bazi ko intego zabo bwite z'amafaranga zishobora kubana - kandi no kongeraho - icyifuzo cyabo cyo gusubira.
visionP3: Icyerekezo cyacu si ugutanga ibikoresho gusa. Ni uguha inzira irambye aho ubunyacyubahiro buba igice kamere cyo gucunga amafaranga, kandi aho ingaruka zo gutanga zigaragara, zipimika, kandi zifite icyo bivuze.
sustainableImpactDesc: Impinduka y'igihe kirekire, si ubufasha gusa
educationEqualizerDesc: Mu nzira zose zo kurema impinduka nziza, twahisemo uburezi ku mpamvu imwe yoroshye: birakora.
breaksCycleDesc: Abana babona uburezi bwiza bashobora kabiri gusohoka mu bukene no gutanga neza mu miryango yabo. Uburezi burema amahirwe ashingira mu bihe bitaha.
highImpactDesc: Gusa $50 ishobora guha umwana ibikoresho by'ishuri by'umwaka wose. Ni kimwe mu bisubizo bya hejuru ku gushora mu gutanga - ibisubizo bigaragara ku musanzu muto.
empowersCommunitiesDesc: Abana bize bakura bakaba abayobozi b'umuryango, abarimu, abaganga, n'abashoramari. Mu gushora mu burezi, turi gushora mu buyobozi bw'ejo hazaza h'akarere.
goalsDesc: Dushyiraho intego z'ubushake ariko zishoboka kandi dukurikirana aho tugeze mu bugaragarire

goals.description: Abana bagera ku burezi bw'ubwiza kuva 2026
Abatanga bakora mu muryango wacu w'isi

transparencyDesc: Twizera ko ukwiye kugaragarirwa uko imisanzu yawe ikoreshwa. Dore uko tugabanya buri dola yatanzwe binyuze muri AidVault.
joinMissionDesc: Buri muntu ubika wifatanya na AidVault aba igice cy'ikintu kinini. Tangira urugendo rwawe uyu munsi kandi udufashe kugera ku ntego zacu.
